attributes.action: Local Council Chiefs ridiculous high wages should be cut to save money.
attributes.background: Council Chiefs wages cut, save billions.Example:MD Del: £569,423 (£357,223 Inc. pension).Eric Robinson, Chief Executive: £199,962-Dir Strategy Partnerships: £162,026-Dir Transformation: £137,871-Dir Care Health:£130,021-Dir Business Services (Ass Chief Executive): £128,860-Ass Dir Finance:£108,526

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The pay of senior council officials is the responsibility of local councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could start a new petition about something the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a cap on the salaries of all council officials in England, if that's what you'd like to happen.
